001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.controller;
002
003import android.os.Bundle;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.View.OnClickListener;
007import android.view.ViewGroup;
008import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
009import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
010import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
012import androidx.viewpager2.widget.ViewPager2.OnPageChangeCallback;
013import com.google.android.material.tabs.TabLayoutMediator;
014import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.adapter.BoardsAdapter;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.databinding.FragmentGameBinding;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.viewmodel.GameViewModel;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.viewmodel.PermissionsViewModel;
020import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.viewmodel.PreferencesViewModel;
021import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.viewmodel.UserViewModel;
022
023/**
024 * Demonstrates access to and observation of {@link androidx.lifecycle.LiveData} elements in
025 * {@link GameViewModel},as well as acting as a navigation placeholder. This fragment is used to implement
026 * the viewpager 2 and tabLayoutMediator which allow you to scroll between boards during a game, as well
027 * as handling the action of firing shots using the fire button.
028 */
029@AndroidEntryPoint
030public class GameFragment extends Fragment {
031
032  private FragmentGameBinding binding;
033  private GameViewModel viewModel;
034  private int boardSize;
035  private int playerCount;
036  private int currentBoardIndex;
037
038  @Override
039  public void onCreate(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
040    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
041    // where usually we read arguments that have been passed in.
042    GameFragmentArgs gameFragmentArgs = GameFragmentArgs.fromBundle(getArguments());
043    boardSize = gameFragmentArgs.getBoardSize();
044    playerCount = gameFragmentArgs.getPlayerCount();
045  }
046
047  @Nullable
048  @Override
049  public View onCreateView(@NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, @Nullable ViewGroup container,
050      @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
051    binding = FragmentGameBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
052    binding.playerBoardsHost.registerOnPageChangeCallback(new BoardChangeListener());
053    binding.fireButton.setOnClickListener((v) -> viewModel.submitShots());
054    // where we add listeners and configure view widgets.
055
056    return binding.getRoot();
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
061    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
062    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(GameViewModel.class);
063    viewModel.getGame()
064        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(), (game) -> {
065          BoardsAdapter adapter = new BoardsAdapter(this, game);
066          binding.playerBoardsHost.setAdapter(adapter);
067          binding.playerBoardsHost.setCurrentItem(currentBoardIndex);
068          new TabLayoutMediator(binding.playerBoards, binding.playerBoardsHost,
069              (tab, position) -> tab.setText(
070                  game.getBoards().get(position).getPlayer().getDisplayName()))
071              .attach();
072          if (game.isYourTurn()) {
073            binding.fireButton.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
074            binding.shotsRemaining.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
075            binding.shotsRemainingLabel.setVisibility(View.VISIBLE);
076          } else {
077            binding.fireButton.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
078            binding.shotsRemaining.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
079            binding.shotsRemainingLabel.setVisibility(View.INVISIBLE);
080          }
081        });
082    viewModel.getShotsRemaining()
083        .observe(getViewLifecycleOwner(),
084            (remaining) -> binding.shotsRemaining.setText(String.valueOf(remaining)));
085    }
086
087  private class BoardChangeListener extends OnPageChangeCallback {
088
089    @Override
090    public void onPageSelected(int position) {
091      super.onPageSelected(position);
092      currentBoardIndex = position;
093    }
094
095  }
096
097}
